Fri, 20 Sep 2024 17:00:00 +0000 Peter Thomas, a former conductor of the Auckland Symphony Orchestra, has been found guilty of serious misconduct by the Teachers’ Disciplinary Tribunal after having sex with a student at Epsom Girls Grammar School. Photo / Supplied
